Class RunFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.support.v4.app.Fragment
      • com.bignerdranch.android.runtracker.RunFragment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ComponentCallbacks, View.OnCreateContextMenuListener

    public class RunFragment
extends Fragment
    Fragment to display information about a single run.
    Author:
    Bill Phillips, Brian Hardy, ajkwak@users.noreply.github.com (AJ Parmidge)
